originalTitle: At least 55 Ghanaians killed in Russia-Ukraine war, minister says
title: At least 55 Ghanaians killed in Russia-Ukraine war, minister says
content: This is the highest number of confirmed casualties from a single African country in the Ukraine-Russia war.

originalTitle: Former US diplomat sentenced to life for abusing two girls in Burkina Faso
title: Former US diplomat sentenced to life for abusing two girls in Burkina Faso
content: He used the girls' mother's life-threatening illness as an opportunity to demand sex, said the US Office of Public Affairs.

originalTitle: Epstein tried to buy a palace in Morocco days before his arrest in 2019
title: Epstein tried to buy a palace in Morocco days before his arrest in 2019
content: The disgraced financier was in talks to buy luxury abode Bin Ennakhi - but the purchase was never completed.

originalTitle: Emergency alert interrupts Al Jazeera broadcast before attack in Qatar
title: Emergency alert interrupts Al Jazeera broadcast before attack in Qatar
content: National emergency alerts blared during a live Al Jazeera broadcast just moments before explosions were heard in Qatar.

originalTitle: Iran strikes US military base in Bahrain as explosions heard across Gulf
title: Iran strikes US military base in Bahrain as explosions heard across Gulf
content: Plumes of smoke rose after Iran targeted a US military base in Bahrain, following Israel–US attacks across Iran.

originalTitle: LIVE: Pakistan vs Sri Lanka – T20 World Cup Super Eights
title: LIVE: Pakistan vs Sri Lanka – T20 World Cup Super Eights
content: Follow our live build-up, with toss and team news coverage, before our text commentary stream of the Group 2 game.

originalTitle: What we know about the joint US-Israel attack on Iran
title: What we know about the joint US-Israel attack on Iran
content: Iran has retaliated with a missile barrage towards Israel, while explosions have been heard in Qatar, Bahrain, Saudi Arabia, and the UAE.

originalTitle: Bill Clinton asked about hot tub photo and testifies he knew 'nothing' of Epstein crimes
title: Bill Clinton asked about hot tub photo and testifies he knew 'nothing' of Epstein crimes
content: The former president told the committee that he would never have flown on Epstein's plane if he "had any inkling of what he was doing".

originalTitle: At least 15 killed after military plane carrying banknotes crashes in Bolivia
title: At least 15 killed after military plane carrying banknotes crashes in Bolivia
content: Police fire tear gas to disperse crowds allegedly trying to take banknotes from the crash site.

originalTitle: Emery's title 'dream' over - but will Villa salvage top-five hopes?
title: Emery's title 'dream' over - but will Villa salvage top-five hopes?
content: Aston Villa boss Unai Emery concedes his Premier League title "dreams" are over, but will the club salvage their Champions League hopes?

originalTitle: The moment I told my mum I wanted to stop football - and how life changed
title: The moment I told my mum I wanted to stop football - and how life changed
content: England captain Leah Williamson tells presenter Kelly Somers about her journey in football - and life away from the game.

originalTitle: What next for Salah and Liverpool?
title: What next for Salah and Liverpool?
content: Mohamed Salah is once again regularly starting for Liverpool but is this the start of a long goodbye for the record-breaking Egyptian at Anfield
